channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.0.9
item.description:
About v10.0.9 Update

  • v10.0.9: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.0.8: Minor improvements.
  • v10.0.7: Fixed an issue: A message "Karabiner cannot connect with kernel extension" might be shown in some environment.
  • v10.0.6: Show an error alert when Karabiner is not placed in /Applications.
  • v10.0.5: Some improvements.
  • v10.0.5: Suppress AXNotifier logs.
  • v10.0.4: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.0.3: Fixed an issue: The continuous key sequence will be improper order in environments which VMWare Fusion is installed.
  • v10.0.2: Added KeyCode::VK_IOHIKEYBOARD_TOGGLE_NUMLOCK.
  • v10.0.1: Updated prepared settings.
Karabiner Web Site
